Entries.Fri2: We're all going to hang out in the saloon this evening. It's kind of like a Friday tradition, I guess.

Entries.Tue: The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#*sigh*... I wish there were more boys in this town, know what I mean?$s^Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you have a bikini?
Entries.Wed: Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.^I'd ask you to play catch, but you seem too girly.#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a girl like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair wasn't so popular with the guys, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a saleswoman
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey, I want to ask you something.^Hey, can I ask you something?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#Do you think the guys like my haircut?^What do you think about my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth.
Entries.fall_Wed_01_old: I put too much hairspray in my hair today. It kind of hurts.#$e#Don't touch it!#$e#...what?
Entries.winter_Sat: There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that girl Sabrina. Why does she wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it.

Entries.Introduction: Ah, the new farmer we've all been expecting... and whose arrival has sparked many a conversation!#$b#I'm Elena... I live in the little cabin by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Entries.event_boat1: So am I.$l^... I was worried you might not feel this way about another woman.$l

Entries.summer_Sat: Don't overwork yourself or you might end up in Harriet's clinic!

Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Alex: How's my granddaughter doing? I imagine she's quite happy living on the farm.#$e#She deserves to be happy... she's a good girl.
Entries.fall_Sat: Are you friends with Alex?#$e#Sometime she worries me sick.

Entries.Wed: Alex is my granddaughter. Have I told you that already?#$e#Huh? Speak up.
Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my granddaughter found such a nice husband.^How can two women get married? It's unnatural... Hmmph. I guess I'm just "old fashioned"...
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.^I'll admit, I thought it was... strange... for two women to be together. But you're such a nice young lady, and I know you two are in love... I've changed my mind.

Entries.Event_room1: Her? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alex. But not anymore! She's immature.
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see Alex could you tell her I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.

Entries.Introduction: ONE^TWO.#$e#I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.#$e#I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.$h

Entries.Sun10: Did you know Shane's my godmother? She was a friend of my parents.$s#$e#...they died.*sniff*$s

Entries.Thu6: Where does all the time go? *sigh*#$e#I remember when Sam was a little baby wearing diapers. She was such a cute little kid.$s#$e#Don't tell her I said that.$h#$e#You must really like talking to me, huh?
Entries.fall_Thu: Maybe I've spoiled the kids a bit. They've never had to do any chores.#$e#I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, Sam's basically a woman now, though.#$b#I hope she hasn't grow up to be lazy. That won't do.$s#$e#Being a parent isn't very easy.
Entries.winter_Thu: Sam makes a lot of noise with that music of hers. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.
Entries.winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam: How's Sam doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since she moved out...

Entries.Thu6: #$1 Kent1#I've been up since 4 o'clock... sometimes I wonder if I'll ever get back into a normal routine.$k#$e#Sam has really grown up since I left. Se's a woman now.#$e#I wish I could've been there for herim.$s
Entries.Thu: Are you friends with my daughter?#$e#You probably know her better than I do...$s

Entries.Tue: My niece Shane has been staying at my place the last few months.#$e#She helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.

Entries.Rainy_Night_Maru: Where you able to accomplish much today, hun?#$e#I tried to fix up some things around the house... you know, just little stuff.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Sebastian: #$c .5#I may be a reclusive girl, but I'm always happy when you're around.$h#$e#Hi, @. Good to see you. It's comforting when you're around.$h

Entries.winter_Sam: I've given up on being a musician. I'm a family girl now!

Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with Sabrina before we met. She was probably the one...$s

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm a married girl!
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: How's it going? I've been carrying the old gridball around with me all day. A girl can pretend...$u
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay healthy... Sorry.$l
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home mom.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like Mommy.
Entries.OneKid_3: It's wasn't fun being pregnant.$s^I wonder what it's like to be pregnant...?$h
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I better do some extra push-ups tonight.$9#$e#Those dresses are pretty tight... and everyone's going to be watching closely.

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're together. The bachelorette life wasn't particularly healthy for me.
Entries.OneKid_3: Caring for babies isn't exactly my strong suit... but I'll do my best to be a good mother.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I was carrying %kid1 earlier, and I could've sworn I heard a "Ma...ma".$h
Entries.fall_26: Would you still love me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a woman has primitive urges...

Entries.Outdoor_2: I may not be the most exciting girl, but I'll stay loyal to you for the rest of my life.$l
Entries.OneKid_3: So far, I really like being a mother!$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.$l#$e#I had nightmares of being a bachelorette forever.... I love you so much.$l
Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, dear! It's very dangerous for your skin.$8#$e#As your wife and doctor, I consider your health and safety my top priority!

Entries.spring_22: If my sister wasn't such a hermit I'd invite her over for dinner sometime.
Entries.summer_20: I wonder if my sister will ever have the courage to ask Abigail out?

Entries.OneKid_1: It's weird, but I really like being a mother!$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: I never thought I'd have such a big family, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great.$l
Entries.winter_1: The cold air makes my hairspray freeze. It's not very pleasant.$s

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Do you think Sabrina and Abigail will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be cool to see Sabrina again.

Entries.Outdoor_3: I don't want to be a pansy now that I'm married. Maybe I should start eating more hot pepper and working out?#$e#Just an idea...$h
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to being a mother. Don't worry, I'll take good care of %kid1! It's just... something new.
Entries.winter_1: What are you plans this winter? I know it's more of a laid-back time for you.
Entries.Good_3: I don't often show it, but I'm really happy that I'm your wife. Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.$l
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? Do we have to go?#$e#I hate wearing that ridiculous tight dress. Why does Lewis make us do this?$s

Entries.fall_15: The Stardew Valley Fair is a little crowded for my tastes... but I'll just hang out with Sam. It'll be good to catch up with her.#$e#You should play some carnival games, though! Don't worry about me.$7

Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I do appreciate all the work you do. I'm a lucky girl.$6
Entries.OneKid_3: Mama Shane reporting for duty...$6#$e#Buh... I've become corny in my old age.

Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harriet's clinic.#$b#She says she likes having me around in case her medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Entries.Wed8: I work at Harriet's clinic on Tuesdays and Thursdays.#$e#She's nice, but not really my type...
Entries.Event_Hospital_1: Of course she'll know the difference! This sample is completely ruined!%fork$s
Entries.Event_Hospital_3: You're right. I should just tell her the truth.%fork$u

Entries.summer_Tue: Sabrina is my half-sister, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
Entries.summer_Tue4: Sabrina hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if she even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a sister but she doesn't act like one.

Entries.Fri: You've met my daughter Sabrina, right? She lives downstairs.#$e#She's a little shy, but I'm sure she'll warm up to you if you're nice to her.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my Sabby... she was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in her.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sabrina's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sabrina... she doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about her future very much...#$e#I would talk to her about it but she never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: Sabrina told me she's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of her.
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for Sabby.

Entries.Mon8: I'll tell you a secret... my name 'Sam' is short for 'Samantha'.$l#$e#Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.

Entries.Wed6: I've been friends with Sabrina for a while. She's a pretty cool girl.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.

Entries.dumped_Guys: %Shane has a glazed look in her eye. She won't speak to you.
Entries.JojaMart: %Shane's hard at work. She doesn't seem interested in talking.
Entries.event_room1: Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask Elena for advice next time I see her at the saloon.$s

Entries.Mon: I wanna be just like my big sister when I grow up!$h#$e#Okay! Bye!

Entries.56/f Harvey 500/p George: jaunty/16 18/farmer 9 24 0 George 16 18 1 Harvey 15 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Harvey "Okay, George. I want you take a deep breath for me."/pause 700/speak Harvey "Mmhmm... turn around, please."/pause 300/faceDirection George 2/faceDirection George 3/speak Harvey "George, I'll be honest with you. You need to make some changes in your lifestyle if you want to stay healthy.#$b#I'd like you to reduce your sodium intake, and try to get some moderate exercise with your arms."/emote George 12/speak George "Hmmph... I know what's best for me. Who do you think you are, telling me how to live my life?"/pause 500/speak Harvey "I'm your doctor, George. That's who I am...#$b#And I went to school for 8 years so I could learn how to help people stay healthy."/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 5 0 0/faceDirection Harvey 2 true/faceDirection George 2/speak Harvey "Oh!#$b#I'm sorry, but you shouldn't be here... these check-ups are supposed to be private."/faceDirection farmer 3/speak George "Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young man.^Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young lady."/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Harvey "Very well..."/speak Harvey "$q 84 null#@, what do you think George should do?#$r 84 40 event_george1#George should follow Dr. Harriet's advice.#$r 85 -40 event_george2#George knows what's best for his own body."/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection George 2/emote George 28/speak George "Fine. Please remember that in the future."/end

Entries.BathHouse_WomensLocker.4: Alex's Locker... There's a bunch of pictures of bodybuilders taped inside the door.
Entries.JoshHouse.1: Momma-^If you're reading this, it means I've passed on. I'm so sorry you had to go through this. Know that I love you both.^Don't be too upset, I'm with Yoba now. ^My final request: take care of Alex. She needs a family, something stable. She's a good kid.^ Love, ^Clara
Entries.JoshHouse.7: You peek into Alex's drawer. There's clothes, hairspray, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.8: You peek into Alex's drawer. There's clothes, hairspray, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.9: It's Alex's gridball helmet. Looks like she keeps it polished.

Entries.ElliottHouse.2: Elena's work desk. It's covered in notes and crumpled papers.
Entries.ElliottHouse.4: It looks like Elena is trying to grow a bonsai tree. It looks cool so far!
Entries.ElliottHouse.6: It looks like Elena is trying to grow a bonsai tree. It looks cool so far!

Entries.Hospital.3: It's probably not a good idea to stick your hands in there. It's full of used syringes, dirty swabs, and little nozzles that Harriet stuck into people's ears.

Entries.SamHouse.11: It's Sam's computer. She's got an extensive library of computer games.

Entries.AnimalShop.8: Looks like she's using the radio as an alarm clock.

Entries.2: It's Sam's holiday shopping list^^Everyone's favorites^^Sabrina: Frozen Tear, Sashimi^Penny: Emerald, Poppy^Vincent: Grape, Cranberry Candy^Mom: Crispy Bass, Pancakes^Dad: Risotto, Roasted Hazelnuts^Me: Cactus, Maple Bar, Pizza

Entries.7: It's a page from someone's diary...^^...There are only a few 'older' bachelors and bachelorettes in town, and none of them are perfect! Harriet is really anxious and weak, but I know she would make a loyal and devoted wife. She likes coffee and pickles.^^Elliott is a bit foppish and melodramatic, but he does have a nice chin. He likes crab cakes and pomegranates.^^Shane is messy and anti-social. But I think his gruff exterior is a defense mechanism, insulating his softness from the world. He likes Beer, Pizza, and Pepper Poppers.

Entries.1000005_Friends: pause 900/move Sebastian 0 0 1/pause 300/stopMusic/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "I had a... horrible nightmare last night about my dad. Not Demetrius. My biological father.$2#$b#I try to not think about him at all. It only brings back bad memories.$2#$b#There's a reason my mom divorced him.$2"/pause 1000/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "He was abusive, a drunk, and a gambler. Whenever he lost money, he'd take it out on Mom and me...$2#$b#Took all her savings and gambled it away. He even stole my paychecks from the part time job I had before I started doing web design.$2"/pause 1500/speak Sebastian "My father would never take no for an answer...$2"/pause 1500/move Sebastian 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Eventually, mom had enough. She was sick and tired of him stealing everything from us, so she hid our money. He...$0#$b#He didn't like that...$2"/pause 1500/emote Sebastian 28/pause 2000/move Sebastian 0 0 2/pause 250/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 1300/speak Sebastian "We'll never see him again. Good riddance.$0"/pause 1300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 1600/speak Sebastian "I... I don't know why I'm telling this. I haven't told anyone about my dad, not even Maru.$2"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "...$2"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "But you know what? I feel like a 20-ton weight has been lifted off my chest and I can breathe again.$0#$b#I've been feeling awful about this for a long time.$2"/pause 500/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 600/question fork1 "#You've gone through so much in life...#I listened to most of what you were saying."/fork 1000005_Promise/pause 400/stopMusic/pause 400/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "...Get away from me, @. You're unbelievable.$5"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Sebastian -750/end dialogue Sebastian "...$5#$e#%Sabrina is ignoring you."
Entries.1000005_Promise: pause 750/speak Sebastian "...$1"/friendship Sebastian 100/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Gonna ponder for a little longer. Still a lot I need to process.$2#$b#...Thanks for talking to me.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end dialogue Sebastian "You know... what I told you was something I thought I'd take to the grave.$2#$b#You need to keep what I told you a secret.$0#$e#%Sabrina smiles. You sense she's more trusting of you."

Entries.1000017_EverythingOkay: pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1400/speak George "...I got bad news from Harriet.$2"/pause 800/move George 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic echos/pause 500/animate George false true 999999 16/pause 1500/speak George "I've had more pain than usual in the mornings, but I didn't think it was a big deal.$2#$b#Evelyn forced me to visit the clinic a few days ago. Harriet found cysts that are the result of... cancer.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 1200/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 650/speak George "I told Evelyn and Alex. They didn't take the news too well...$2#$b#Evelyn said we'll find the best surgeon in the Ferngill Republic to remove them.$2#$b#Harriet also recommended some specialists in Zuzu City.$2"/pause 1500/speak George "To tell you the truth, I'm scared, @.$2#$b#In times like these, I can only find solace in praying to Yoba.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation George/pause 650/move George 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak George "Yoba has helped me before when I asked for it. I'm confident Yoba will lend me the power to get through this.$0"/pause 200/question fork1 "#You have friends and family here to support you.#Praying won't make it better."/fork 1000017_GetThroughThis/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 600/shake George 1000/emote George 28/pause 500/move George 0 0 3/pause 500/speak George "...Leave.$2#$b#Talking to you will surely not help.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship George -1000/end dialogue George "Don't dictate what I should and shouldn't believe in, @.$0#$b#Especially when I just told you I'm very sick...$2"

Entries.jodi_event2: Thank you for the idea, @.$2#$b#I'll talk to Harriet about this. I'm sure she'll be happy to refer us to someone.$2

Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1200/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#It's Kent...$2#$b#I love him and I'm so glad he's finally home but...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1100/speak Jodi "Ever since he got back, he just... he hasn't been the same person.$2#$b#He never laughs anymore. He won't talk to me. He practically ignores Vincent and Sam. He hardly eats any food. We haven't had-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 450/speak Jodi "He's opened up a little about some of the horrors he experienced. The things he's seen. The friends he lost. What he went through when he was captured...$2#$b#Yesterday, Vincent was watching a cartoon and he accidently pushed a button on the remote and made the TV go static.$2#$b#Kent immediately fell to the floor and put his hands over his head...$2#$b#Later, he told me that at his base, the TV screens would go to static right before an alarm sounded. When they heard it, everyone knew they had to take cover.$2"/pause 200/emote Jodi 28/pause 200/speak Jodi "Harriet gave him some medicine that should help with the symptoms of PTSD.$2#$b#I can't tell if it's made a difference.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*sniff*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "He's hurting so much, and I don't know how to help him, @. I feel helpless...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Kent needs you now more than ever.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#You might want to look for a therapist in Zuzu or Pine-Mesa City."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#I'm sorry, @. I had all of that bottled up, and I might have said too much.$2#$b#Thank you for listening to me. You, Olivia, and Caroline are my closest friends, and you're always there for me$2."/pause 1500/speak Jodi "I hope one day I can be there for you, too.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event3#If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#With a combined effort, there's nothing you two can't accomplish."/pause 1700/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "I'll follow the advice you gave me.$1"/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 550/speak Jodi "I need to finish watering these flowers, okay? I'll talk to you later. Thank you again.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Thank you for talking to me earlier, @. I know what to do to help Kent. I think things will be better soon.$0"

Entries.fall_Mon8: You're working so hard, sweetie! This energy tonic from Doctor Harriet will help you get your energy back.[349]$3#$e#Have a wonderful day!$1
Entries.winter_Sun: I feel as if I'm starting to get sick. This winter has been unusually cold.$2#$e#I need to pay a visit to Harriet. We're fortunate to have an experienced doctor in the valley.$0
Entries.winter_Sun8: Are you all right, @? You look a little pale.$6#$e#...Make sure you're taking good care of your health, sweetie. You might want to check in with Harriet.$6#$e#I wouldn't want anything to happen to you.$2

Entries.Bad_2: I'm not feeling well. I should see Doctor Harriet.$2#$b#You might want to stay away, in case it's contagious.$2

Entries.Hospital_6_17: Um. I'm busy getting my medication from doctor Harvey.$2

Entries.Outdoor_Victor: I picked up a health tonic from Doctor Harriet for you.$1#$b#This will energize your body so you can get more work done.[349]$1#$e#Have a splendid day!$3
Entries.Bad_4: I think I got sick last night. I feel nauseated. Don't touch me, @.$2#$e#I don't want to get you sick too! I'll pick up some medicine from Doctor Harriet today.$2
